channel.title: A Complete Remake of the Ventrilo Status Script
channel.description:
This is a complete remake which I've done recently for the [url=http://www.ventrilo.com/download.php]PHP Ventrilo Status Scripts[/url] (Found in the Extras category). [b]In order to run the script, you must download a copy of the "Linux i386 - 32bit" Server Program for the ventrilo_status script. Be sure to specify the script's location in __request() in class.VentriloStatus.php[/b].
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2nkurcw.png[/img]
You can find a demo [url=http://www.zachera.com/ventrilo/]here[/url].
Download the source in a ZIP file [url=http://www.zachera.com/ventrilo/Ventrilo.zip]here[/url].

item.title: A Complete Remake of the Ventrilo Status Script
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

I was always rather curious as to how the Status page worked on Ventrilo. Once I found out and saw how horribly the code was written to display this handy information, I was bound to rebuild it. I can’t seem to decide between whether the PHP script off of the Ventrilo site was built by a horrible PHP programmer, built a long time ago, or it was built to stabilize with PHP 4 and 5. It’s a hard thought to put out since Flagship Industries, Inc. is more of a quiet, small company; many companies like that tend to keep their experiences to themselves. But I’m leaning more towards the “horrible PHP programmer”, since Ventrilo development is really slow right now, and they just released 3.0.4 after some five months. I just hope that the Ventrilo application isn’t written in such a horrid setting.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2008, 12:56:27 am[/size][hr]Updated this a lot more. New script, same download link, same demo link.

  • Added plus/minus channel capabilities (Made it look more like the Ventrilo application itself)
  • Fixed problems occuring with Codec and Format, Max clients, Password
  • Moved style to style.css

Read full topic
item.source: A Complete Remake of the Ventrilo Status Script

The “ventrilo_status” file which comes with the server software.

item.title: A Complete Remake of the Ventrilo Status Script
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

This is a complete remake which I’ve done recently for the PHP Ventrilo Status Scripts (Found in the Extras category). In order to run the script, you must download a copy of the “Linux i386 - 32bit” Server Program for the ventrilo_status script. Be sure to specify the script’s location in __request() in class.VentriloStatus.php.

You can find a demo here.

Download the source in a ZIP file here.

Read full topic
